start.title: The Reincarnated Apprentice
start.description: You awaken in the ruins of Arcarium Academy, memories of a past life flickering in your mind. The air is thick with the scent of damp stone and decay. Something stirs in the darkness, watching.

forbidden_archives.title: The Forbidden Archives
forbidden_archives.description:
You push open a massive, dust-covered door, revealing a library untouched by time. Arcane symbols flicker in eerie blue light along the towering bookshelves. A deep, guttural voice echoes from the shadows.

"Who dares trespass in the domain of secrets?" A spectral figure shrouded in tattered robes emerges, its hollow eyes burning with ghostly fire.

battle_specter.title: Battle with a Specter
battle_specter.description:
As you step cautiously through the ruins, an icy wind rushes past you. A ghostly figure materializes, its skeletal grin stretching unnaturally. 

"Flesh... after all these years..." the specter hisses before lunging at you!

cursed_village.title: The Cursed Village
cursed_village.description:
The mist rolls over your feet as you step into the eerie silence of a desolate village. Shadows shift behind broken windows. A distant, haunting whisper carries on the wind. 

"You shouldn't be here..."

choices.text: Seek shelter in an abandoned house

necromancer_fight.title: Necromancer’s Ambush
necromancer_fight.description:
A hooded figure steps forward, skeletal hands raised in incantation. 

"The dead serve me. Soon, you shall too!" he cackles as bones claw their way out of the earth, forming a macabre army.

mystic_merchant.title: The Mystic Merchant
mystic_merchant.description:
A cloaked figure sits beside a flickering lantern in the abandoned house. His single, glowing eye peers at you. 

"Gold for power, power for survival," he whispers. "Choose wisely."

ancient_temple.title: The Ancient Temple
ancient_temple.description: The mountains rise around you, enclosing a forgotten temple bathed in silver moonlight. Strange glyphs glow on the walls, pulsing with energy. You feel an inexplicable pull toward the entrance... as if something is waiting for you.

final_battle.title: The Dark One’s Return
final_battle.description:
A swirling vortex of darkness erupts before you, revealing a towering figure cloaked in living shadows. The Dark One's voice is a whisper and a roar at once. 

"You dare challenge me? Foolish mortal. You shall be the first of many to fall!"

good_ending_1.title: The Light Prevails
good_ending_1.description: With the power of nature, fire, and storm, you channel raw energy into a single strike. The Dark One shrieks as light engulfs him, dissolving the darkness. The world is safe... for now.

bad_ending_1.title: Corrupted by Power
bad_ending_1.description: The forbidden spells pulse through your veins, intoxicating, overwhelming. The Dark One falls, but his power does not vanish—it flows into you. Darkness has a new master... and the world trembles.
